TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Window/FrameRightSizingTemplate extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a that represents the sizing template of the right border of a window. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.FrameRightSizingTemplate.Normal%2A> property of the VisualStyleElement.Window.FrameRightSizingTemplate class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> that represents the sizing template of the right border of a window.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.FrameRightSizingTemplate.Normal%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementWindowFrameRightSizingTemplate1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#432](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/eaaa3f2c-0bbc-4e3b-9941-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#432](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/eaaa3f2c-0bbc-4e3b-9941-_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the sizing template of the right border of a window.
Docs.value: A that represents the sizing template of the right border of a window.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Normal property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Normal property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementWindowFrameRightSizingTemplate1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#432](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/ebec7a89-8c0c-425f-b86f-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#432](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/ebec7a89-8c0c-425f-b86f-_1.vb)]
